wikipedia_page.main:
Laurance "Laurie" Thomas David Daniel (born 5 March 1942) is a former Wales international rugby union player. 
Daniel made his debut for Wales on 7 February 1970 versus Scotland. He played club rugby for Newport RFC and Pontypool RFC.

response: Jones learnt his rugby under the tutelage of Laurie Daniel who was a former Welsh international who played for Pontypool and Newport. He later turned to coaching and in the 1996/97 season became the first full-time coach of Newport.
